author: USA TODAY, Ryan W. Miller, USA TODAY
title: What does furlough mean? Can I leave my home under shelter-in-place? Coronavirus terms, explained
description: What does it mean when you hear New York is the coronavirus "epicenter" in the United States? Do doctors say they need ventilators or respirator?
content:
We answer the often searched question: "What are the symptoms of coronavirus versus the flu?"
USA TODAY
Most people know what social distancing is by now. They've heard that the coronavirus outbreak has been declared a pandemic.
